pages.text: Sauroctonus is a genus of gorgonopsid from the Late Permian period. They had a pair of canines on both the upper and lower jaws and the lower jaw formed a kind of chin. Sauroctonus was not as specialized as other gorgonopsids like Rubidgea and Inostrancevia and they also had very mammalian features despite not being an ancestor to mammals.
